page.title: 14LEISURE IN STRATTON
page.content:
For leisure time in Stratton we have {Grange Drive Community Centre}and {Stratton Youth Centre,}also there are various churchs with Guides, Brownies, Scouts, Cubs, Girls Brigade, Boys Brigade and various youth clubs. The {Community Centre}is in the local area. It has changing rooms with showers, 2 squash courts, a 5-a-side football court, badminton, tennis and table tennis facilities. There is a pool table and a T.V. room with video games. There is a licensed bar, tuck shop and full catering facilities for weddings, disco's etc. The Community Centre was opened in 1976 and has become a valuable amenity for the local population.
There is also a recreation ground which is a popular meeting place for local children.
